name: Rooms DS
description:
An invitation abruptly arrived at your doorstep and unknowingly diverted you to a world filled with mystic beauty. In that world, you need to reach the exit by sliding rooms in the same way as a slide puzzle. At the same time you must use fantastic devices to navigate through each of these rooms. The solution is only a doorstep away!

Features

• Level swap with other players via local wireless connection.
